member.name: IMAGEINFO
member.summary: Contains information about an image in an image list. This structure is used with the function.

member.name: IMAGEINFO.hbmImage
member.summary: A handle to the bitmap that contains the images.

member.name: IMAGEINFO.hbmMask
member.summary: A handle to a monochrome bitmap that contains the masks for the images. If the image list does not contain a mask, this member is NULL.

member.name: IMAGEINFO.Unused1
member.summary: Not used. This member should always be zero.

member.name: IMAGEINFO.Unused2
member.summary: Not used. This member should always be zero.

member.name: IMAGEINFO.rcImage
member.summary: The bounding rectangle of the specified image within the bitmap specified byhbmImage.
